scripts.get-verified: sh mini-scripts/horizontal-line.sh && node_modules/@rockset/cli/bin/run sql "$(cat get-verified.sql)" && sh mini-scripts/horizontal-line.sh
scripts.get-unverified: sh mini-scripts/horizontal-line.sh && node_modules/@rockset/cli/bin/run sql "$(cat get-unverified.sql)" && sh mini-scripts/horizontal-line.sh
scripts.get-unverified-codes: sh mini-scripts/horizontal-line.sh && node_modules/@rockset/cli/bin/run sql "$(cat get-unverified-codes.sql)" && sh mini-scripts/horizontal-line.sh
scripts.get-signup-times: sh mini-scripts/horizontal-line.sh && node_modules/@rockset/cli/bin/run sql "$(cat get-signup-times.sql)" && sh mini-scripts/horizontal-line.sh
scripts.get-all: sh mini-scripts/horizontal-line.sh && node_modules/@rockset/cli/bin/run sql "$(cat get-all.sql)" && sh mini-scripts/horizontal-line.sh
